citances.sentence: [3] " FMC Rules ". [4] " FC Rules ". Applicant N v Respondent C [2007] FCA 1182 at para. 35 per Sundberg J (" Applicant N --- Appeal ") upholding the Judgment in this Court in Applicant N v Respondent C [2006] FMCA 1936 (" Applicant N "); and following ACCC v Amcor Printing Papers Group [2000] FCA 17 ; (2000) 169 ALR 344 at 356-357 per Sackville J; [2007] FCA 17 at para. 60 per Sackville J (" Amcor Printing ").
